description:
The Story
You’re an average girl of 25 whose life consists of working at the local library, maintaining your family's shrine, and little else. 
However, that all changes when gorgeous men save you from malevolent malevolent forces!
These men aren't all they appear to be, though. In reality, they're Ayakashi Spirits!
According to them, you've been blessed with magical blood which the demon world will stop at nothing to get their hands on.
Upon discovering that your blood is imbued with an ancient power - one that the spirit world covets - these handsome strangers are willing to protect you... 
For a price, that is.
Are you prepared to make a deal with these otherworldly creatures?

Character
Kiryu　　  "The Aloof Dragon"
Chikage　 "The Icy Tengu"
Yukinojo　"The Enigmatic Snow Spirit"

Contents
Includes "Main Stories" in the App "Love 365: Find Your Story".
Season1 Prologue
Main Story
His PoV

Thorns in the Bouquet
Thorns in the Bouquet Epilogue
A Twisted Wedding Arch

＊"A Twisted Wedding Arch" is recorded only for Kiryu.
name: Enchanted in the Moonlight - Kiryu, Chikage & Yukinojo -
